    All functions

    build_github_vignette()
    Build Vignettes for Github

    Determine the different phases of the day
    check_dt()
    Check if an object is a `data.table`
    data_cop
    Oceanographic information from North East Pacific
    data_nes
    Diving parameters of weanling Northern Elephant Seals in 2016 and 2018
    data_ses
    Diving parameters of weanling Southern Elephant Seals in 2014
    .n()
    Retrieve elements' name of a list within apply function
    flat_cor_mat()
    Flatten correlation matrix
    format_col()
    Format columns
    gt_plt_bar_stack_extra()
    Add a percent stacked barchart in place of existing data.
    is_outlier()
    Find outliers using interquartile range rule
    location_treatment()
    Treat location data with a continuous-time state-space model
    matlab_to_posix()
    Convert Matlab datenum to POSIX
    plot_comp()
    Plot the evolution of a diving parameter accross time between two populations
    plot_ind()
    Display summary information for a seal
    theme_jjo()
    A personnalised ggplot theme
